english.segment1: I try to reach your outstretched hand. Oh why do I?. I try. I fail you. I try to reach your outstretched hand. Oh why do I?. I try. I fail you.
english.segment2: Strike a match, for I deserve to burn. Light a match, for I deserve to burn. Light a match, for I deserve to burn. Light a match, for I deserve to burn. burn, burn, burn, burn, burn, burn, burn.
english.segment3: I try to reach your outstretched hand. Oh why do I?. I try. I fail you.
